thread.title: Ground News - Father of Molly Russell among campaigners and charity workers given New Year Honours
thread.title_full: Ground News - Father of Molly Russell among campaigners and charity workers given New Year Honours

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Father of Molly Russell among campaigners and charity workers given New Year Honours
text:
Summary by Ground News Ian Russell has been given an MBE for services to child online safety. Molly Russell took her own life after viewing harmful material online. Hundreds of activists, campaigners, and charity workers have been recognised. Youngest recipient is nine-year-old Tony Hudgell, who will get a BEM. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Sky News UK Center High Factuality Individual: Roberts Family Father of Molly Russell among campaigners and charity workers given New Year Honours Elsewhere, Tony Hudgell is this year's youngest recipient at nine-years-old and will get a British Empire Medal, while 97-year-old Jill Gladwell becomes an MBE for services to the Royal British Legion.
